Description.Text: The Reserve Hotel New York is known as Holiday Inn New York City - Wall Street - New York. With stylish atmosphere and a wide array of personalized services, the Holiday Inn New York City Wall Street is an ideal place for everyone to escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. This hotel is located in Lower Manhattan’s Financial District, this Holiday Inn is 4 blocks from Wall Street, 5 blocks from the New York Stock Exchange, and 6 blocks from City Hall. The Century 21 discount department store, a bargain-hunters paradise, is less than 2 blocks away. Ferries to the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island depart from Battery Park, about a half-mile south. Holiday Inn New York Wall Street is smoke-free. The front desk, business center, and fitness room are open 24 hours a day. Guests’ children dine free at the on-site restaurant when accompanied by a paying adult.

Federal Reserve Bank of New York - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi St. Paul's Chapel - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Federal Hall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Trinity Church - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi New York Stock Exchange - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Brooklyn Bridge - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi Ellis Island - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi Statue of Liberty - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Empire State Building - 4.9 km / 3 mi Grand Central Terminal - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi Chrysler Building - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi Times Square - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi Broadway - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi Rockefeller Plaza - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi Central Park - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi

Renovated in 2009; The hotel's 113 elegant guest rooms are designed in distinct styles and also come with an array of exceptional amenities to create an ambiance of a private residence. guestrooms feature new bedding, complimentary wireless Internet access, and 32-inch flat-panel HDTVs with premium channels and pay movies. Desks come with easy-access electrical outlets. Other amenities include coffee/tea makers, cordless phones with voice mail, and bathrooms with shower/tub combination.

Business travelers can make use of the well-appointed business center that enables them to transact without stepping out. For those who wish to know more information about the New York's finest shopping, restaurants and attractions, can approach the friendly staff who will be glad to assist with every service that everyone desire during The stay at Holiday Inn New York City Wall Street.

The Cafe offers delicious meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner with a variety of cocktails in a casual atmosphere.
Nearby Restaurants: • Federal Cafe: Located within the Holiday Inn - Wall Street hotel • Cabana: Cuban, Jamaican, Caribbean Cuisine • Baoguette: Vietnamese Gourmet Sandwich. Delivery times 10am - 5pm • Subway: Sandwiches, Soup, Salad • Les Halles Downtown: American Beef French Style Restaurant located between Broadway and Nassau Streets
